Get Certified

Microdermabrasion Certification

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

Become a Microdermabrasion specialist with a one day, hands on, intense training program. This course will give you everything you need in order to knowledgeably and confidently perform microdermabrasion consultations and procedures. Our Microdermabrasion course offers a 4 hour training with both theory and extensive practical hands-on application on real models.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Curriculum: Participants will learn the analysis of mechanical mediums using a multitude of devices and compounds and its application for exfoliation treatments, client selection, consultations, pre- and post- treatment considerations.

4 hour course [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Tuition: $400 + HST

 

Private or group classes available

 

$150 Deposit Required.

 

If you are interested in taking 1 or more classes please email us for combination training prices.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

NO REFUNDS OR TRANSFERS DEPOSITS UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCE.

*** IMPORTANT: IF YOU FAIL TO ATTEND CLASS, TUITION WILL RESULT IN A LOSS AND NO REFUNDS WILL BE ISSUED. 

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
